plot: At the Slutwalk NYC rally in Union Square on October 1st, 2011, two topless women protesters are closely watched by a male photojournalist, inviting an experimental feminist filming of the male gaze at work "in the wild".
title: On Seeing and Being Seen
plot_es: At the Slutwalk NYC rally in Union Square on October 1st, 2011, two topless women protesters are closely watched by a male photojournalist, inviting an experimental feminist filming of the male gaze at work "in the wild".
plot_en: At the Slutwalk NYC rally in Union Square on October 1st, 2011, two topless women protesters are closely watched by a male photojournalist, inviting an experimental feminist filming of the male gaze at work "in the wild".
